channel.title: OIL — In Memoriam (Ella) [Elegy]
channel.description:
An old friend of mine died very recently. As soon as I heard, I made this. Something to remember her by. She was important to me. She is the reason I appreciate art the way I do today.
[Here it is.](https://soundcloud.com/oil-official/in-memoriam-ella)
[Also, her family’s opened up a gofundme page to compensate for the sudden financial gap which has opened up.](https://www.gofundme.com/f/ella-forbes-memorial-fund)
Thanks for listening.
